campaign.story:
Black Oak Workshop is proud to present the Dragon d20! These d20s are designed to capture the essence of the five mighty chromatic dragons in all their glory. Each of the five dice features a unique swirled mix that captures the coloration of a specific dragon type and is inked with a bright color that represents its deadly breath weapon. The 20 result on the die features a dragon design that lets you know that you're bringing the pain to your foes!
Who doesn't love dragons? The awesome ranks of dragons are many: Malificent, Drogon, Rotgut, Spyro, Malystryx, Icingdeath, Singe, Smaug or the deadly Vermithrax...who's your favorite? Channel any of them with these killer d20s!
These are gorgeous dice!
To add to the treasure hoard, we've got some fantastic Kickstart Exclusives hand crafted by the fine folks at Dog Might Games and some stretch goals that we are very excited about (more Dragon d20s). Read on fearless adventurer!
Not Your Average d20
Here's what makes these dice special and why we believe they will hold a place of honor in your dice bag!
 Dragon Breath Swirl We're very proud of the coloration of the dice. They feature a blend of two colors with an iridescent glimmer that came out fantastic! We think they are super cool and the blending method perfectly captures the billowing dragon breath attack!
 Larger Size Like the majority of the dice we produce, these dice are larger and stand out on your game table. They tower over lesser dice and make them run for cover! Another upside to our larger size is they are easier to read.
 Draconic Design The design on the 20 face captures the power of the dragon and roars CRITICAL HIT! 
 Tiamat Special You can harness the power of the five most vile dragons in the lands - not just one or two of them. Once funded, All FIVE become available! The Tiamat reward level ensures you can get the whole set.
 Dragons in the Blood? If your character is born of the dragon, these will make the perfect d20 for you - roll in style!
 Dragons Awesome in their own right. Death from above!!
The majority of our dice are scaled to a larger 19mm d6 size. As a result, they stand out on the table and are easy to read. These d20s are no exception and they will intimidate and make other dice flee before them!
Reward Levels
So what's included with each reward level?
Dog Might Games Exclusive
We've partnered with Dog Might Games to present a special Dragon d20 exclusive for you. We asked Dog Might for a design that would pair well with the Dragon d20 and their team stepped up with a beautiful, custom version of their Dragon Sheath dice box for us. It came out fantastic! These boxes are utterly gorgeous and Dog Might's reputation for quality speaks for itself. These are exclusive to Black Oak Workshop's Dragon d20 project and will not be available again after the project has completed!
There are two variations of the boxes. We have a standard version in red and a higher end variant in beautiful padauk wood. Both share these great qualities:
Beautiful all wood design with protective finish
Exclusive dragon design
Embedded magnets keep the lid securely in place
Holds lots of dice - 8.5" x 2.25" x 2.0"
Dog Might Quality - they will last for many years!
You will find the boxes available as part of specific reward levels and they will also be available in the pledge manager so you can pick up additional boxes if you'd like. However, they will not be for sale on our website or as part of future projects so grab yours while you can. We cannot overstate how beautiful these boxes are!
Tiny Dungeons for Your Dragons
The fine folks over at Gallant Knight Games have worked with us on a few projects now and we are glad to see they are back again! Tiny Dungeons by Alan Bahr is a minimalist RPG that has been well received and comes highly rated - check it out here! Backers at the DRAGONS & DUNGEONS reward level will receive a DriveThruRPG link for a PDF download of the game which has an ever growing following of fans! It's a great game!
We wanted to include some cool stretch goals to help keep the excitement up and what would be better than more dragons?
$4,400 Chromatic Dragons & Tiamat Pin (funded) - UNLOCKED 
First and foremost, if we reach our funding goal ALL FIVE of the mighty chromatic dragons will be available! Individual d20s will also be available for purchase in the pledge manager ($5). In addition, every backer receiving rewards will get an exclusive Tiamat pin included with their loot!
$5,500 Tiamat Dice Bag - UNLOCKED
Following through with the Tiamat theme is the Tiamat Dice Bag. WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers can expect one included with their shipment at no additional charge!
You can count on the following features with these awesome dice bags:
Same materials and exceptional quality as our previous dice bags
Light, but tough exterior
Smooth black satin interior
Stay-Tight drawstrings
Fully embroidered Tiamat design
Plenty of room for your dice hoard: 5"x 8"
$7,000 Faerie Dragon d20 - UNLOCKED
The Faerie Dragon isn't evil, but it is mischievous and that's good enough in our book! WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers will receive a Faerie Dragon d20 included with their reward shipment! As with the chromatic dragons, these will also be available for individual purchase in the pledge manager.
$9,000 Dreaded Dracolich d20 - UNLOCKED
The undead embodiment of the evil dragon! WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers will receive a Dracolich d20 included with their reward shipment! As with the chromatic dragons, these will also be available for individual purchase in the pledge manager.
$11,500 Red Dragon Pin - UNLOCKED
Another cool pin to put on your dice bag and this one will bring the fire breathing goodness! WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers will receive one with their reward shipment! As with the the other stretch goal items, these will be available for individual purchase in the pledge manager.
$15,000 Red Dragon Dice Bag - UNLOCKED
Fire breathing dice storage! WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers will receive one with their reward shipment! 
You can count on the following features with these awesome dice bags:
Same materials and exceptional quality as our previous dice bags
Light, but tough exterior
Smooth red satin interior
Stay-Tight drawstrings
Fully embroidered Red Dragon design
Plenty of room for your dice hoard: 5"x 8"
$22,000 Dragon d6 - UNLOCKED
We will take the draconic theme to a d6! WE HIT THIS GOAL! Backers will receive one d6 with their reward shipment!  The dice will be scaled to match the size of our Dragon d20, so the d6 will be 19mm across! All of the base chromatic dragon colors will be unlocked in the d6 and each backer will be able to choose one d6 of their color choice to be included with their reward shipment. Additional d6s will be available in the pledge manager.
$26,000 Dragon d6 Color Options - LOCKED
The remaining color options (Faerie and Dracolich) are unlocked and available to be chosen by backers as their free d6.
$30,000 Full RPG Set - LOCKED
We can take the draconic theme to a full set of RPG dice! The dice will be scaled to match the size of our Dragon d20, so they will be a sight to behold! Backers will participate in a vote to choose which dragon will receive the expanded RPG set. Glorious Tiamat level backers (and higher) will receive a full 7 die set IN ADDITION to their rewards. All other backers (Dragons with Advantage and Tiamat) will be able to buy a set for $15.
Any unlocked stretch goals will be available in the pledge manager as well, so don't worry - if you want more they will be on hand! The cost per dice bag will be $10, additional Dragon d20s and d6s will be $5 and the RPG set will be $15.
Dice Maniacs!
For all you dice lovers out there, Black Oak Workshop encourages you to  visit and join the Dice Maniacs Club on Facebook. It is a great place to share your collection, view some great dice, ask questions and enjoy  all things dice related! 
Shipping
All shipments will be processed through the United States Postal Service. Domestic (USA) orders will ship utilizing First-Class Service and international orders will ship utilizing First-Class Package International Service. All rewards will be packed securely in an effort  to minimize risk of damage during shipping.
For our International backers, we are adding a note that the shipping costs are reflective of  what the USPS charges us. We do not have overseas distribution and likely will not for some time as we are a small shop. As we grow, we hope to be able to get those costs down for you as we know they are  painful.
Thank you for checking out our project!

The consensus seems to be that we should expand this to a full set ASAP and I am actively working on that. I will post another update post fulfillment and will provide some details at that time.

Hello Backers!
Great news in that ALL THE DRAGONS ARE IN! All the pins, bags and dice! We have begun shipping almost a month ahead of schedule! We had some of the colors trickle in over the last few weeks and now the remainder are here. All that is missing are our Dragon Sheath boxes from Dog Might and they are ready as well - we are going to pick them up on the return road trip from GaryCon.

Hello Backers!
The Dragons are in flight and headed our way! We've already received some of them and many others are inbound. What does this mean? It means we should be beginning fulfillment a month ahead of schedule!!
Unless I just jinxed us.

Hello Backers!
Our Red Dragon and Tiamat dice bags have arrived and they look great!

Hello Backers!
Just a short update to let everyone know our pins have arrived and they look great. Check them out!

Hello Backers!
We're 9 days from the charge date for add on orders (January 15). Things are looking pretty darn good. About 93% of you have completed your surveys and this has made ordering all the more easy - we are ahead of schedule! Orders with all our vendors are submitted or will be this week (see below) and production is already underway for most of our items. For those of you who have not completed your surveys, you will be okay to do so later but keep in mind we cannot ship your rewards until you have made your selections and submitted your shipping address.
Dragon Sheath Deadline!

Hello Backers!
The surveys are rolling in and we are right at 86%. If you have not, please knock those surveys out so we can get our orders firmed up. Every day saved here pays off a few months down the road. We are planning to lock current surveys on Jan 1 and then run the cards for any addons in a couple weeks.
Everything is looking good at this stage and we anticipate no issues! I'll keep updating as things develop.

Hello Backers!
We've got all kinds of information for you, so please take a close look.
Surveys/Pledge Manager
First and foremost, we've got our pledge manager off to BackerKit and are hoping they can complete their review by the end of business today. If so, look for those surveys in your inboxes tonight or tomorrow. We'll need you to attack them so we can get our numbers solidified and begin manufacturing. Everyone loves our short fulfillment timelines and this is the part where backers help us the most.

campaign.story:
Black Oak Workshop is here to help ring in your Holiday Season with dice and geek themed stockings and Santa's reindeer are along for the ride! Best of all, domestic backers are guaranteed to receive these stockings in time for Christmas 2018!
This will be a short and direct Kickstart. There will be no stretch goals, but every backer receiving rewards will receive a set of dice which will be included in their shipment in addition to the items from their selected reward level. This should help 'kickstart' your stocking stuff efforts in style! See The RPG Sets section for more details.
The Dice Stocking is our highest quality and largest dice bag to date. That's right! It can serve as both a sturdy stocking to hang from your mantle and also as a dice bag complete with drawstring! These stockings are as tough as Yukon Cornelius and strong as the Bumble. They can hold a whopping TWENTY FIVE standard sets of RPG dice and the loop can take the weight. These are not the cheap stockings found on most store shelves - they are built geek tough and will last for many years!
The green exterior is a soft, low pile velvet material - not the stiff velvet you see in a lot of small dice bags. The red interior is smooth satin like all our bags. The red drawstring stays tight when pulled and the loop can take the weight. Put these out for the holidays and Santa will surely reward you and yours with loads of geeky goodness!
And for those of you with a sharp eye, that glowing, oversized d20 on the mantle is made by none other than Jolly Blackburn over at Amber's Secret Cove. Check out their line of great products!
The stockings come in two distinct designs that backers can choose from during the pledge manager process. You can choose from the The Dice Stocking or The Geek Stocking for each bag you receive! Although the retail on these stockings will be $15, backers of this project will be able to purchase additional stockings in the pledge manager for $13.
Many Uses!
Here are a few of the uses we thought of!
The Reward Levels
There is a reward tier for each reindeer! More directly, there are 5 distinct reward levels of which four have an early bird level. This has led to more reward levels that preserves the theme and gives our backers greater opportunity to get a deal!
The RPG Sets
The dice are standard sized RPG sets consisting of 7 dice per set and each of the options feature a 'pearlescent' design that shimmers in the light. They are good quality and we are offering ten different color mixes that backers can choose from as part of the pledge manager process. You can pick the color for each and every set that you back for from the available colors! These are great dice and perfect for backers who like to customize their dice by re-inking.
Every backer receiving rewards will get one of these sets included with their rewards to help start the stocking stuffing properly! As with any set backed for or purchased in the pledge manager, backers can select the color option for this included set from the ten offered on the project during the pledge manager.
These dice will not not be offered by Black Oak on our web store - we are only offering them as part of this project. Backers will have the option of adding additional sets as part of the pledge manager at a cost of $5 per set.
Add Ons
All Black Oak Workshop products currently in stock will be available for purchase during the pledge manager, so you can be sure to pick up some extra geek and dice goodness to fill your new stocking with!
Retailers
We would love to earn your business retailers! Verified brick and mortar stores are welcome to back at the single bag level and then contact Black Oak through the project or through our website here. Retailers receive a 50% discount with a 10 stocking minimum order. You can expect to receive your orders well before Christmas (just as all backers will). This will mean there will be enough time to get these in front of your customers!
Shipping
We have an excellent success rate at meeting or even beating delivery goals from all of our previous projects so you can count on these making it in time. If you back, you will receive these by Christmas of 2018. Our only exception here is international backers. We cannot guarantee shipments to international backers will arrive by Christmas. However, we can guarantee they will ship the first week of December which should allow plenty of time, but there is no way we can provide any assurance for those backers outside of the USA.
Thank you for checking out our project!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If funded, our priority will be to meet or exceed backer expectations. We structure our Kickstart projects with a goal of minimizing risks and challenges in an effort to help build confidence in our backers:

* Straightforward design
* Visual representation of the final product
* Partner with an established production vendor
* Research and capture all costs
* Provide regular project status updates
* Communicate any issues as they arise

Given the successful fulfillment and positive backer feedback from our earlier projects, we are confident that we can and will meet our stated goals.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Welcome to the Dungeon Realms, a range of full colour, laminated, neoprene dungeon tile system.  
The Dungeon Realms tiles have been designed to be thematic, colourful and interesting but at the same time simple enough to not draw focus from your miniatures or any dungeon furniture you may wish to add to your game. All our Dungeon Tiles use 1" squares.
We will also be able to produce these sets without the lamination, for people that want a matte finish to their tiles!
They have also been designed (where possible) to be as location neutral as can be, so you can mix and match sets and create dungeons for any part of your campaign world. We are launching with three sets of tiles but depending on funding and stretch goals there will be more to choose from.
The current Stretch Goal will unlock large wilderness battlemats that are each the equivalent of a single set of tiles. There will be three wilderness battlemats (plain grasslands, a single road and a fork in the road). They can be laminated or cloth topped and will be 27 1" squares by 17 1" squares. 
Additionally if we hit this stretch goal, the KS exclusive detail tiles will be double sided and feature an alternate version of the same detail on each side, allowing for multiple colours and designs.
Kickstarter Exclusives
Every Backer will recieve the following tiles in the same format of their pledge (digital/physical).
One 4x4 Spell Circle Room
Eight 2x2 "Extra Detail" Tiles
Dungeon Realm Sets
Depending on your pledge you will get to select 1 or more of the following Dungeon Realms sets. All Squares are 1".
The Base Set: Everything you need for a basic Dungeon.
The Expansion Set: Larger rooms with unique details, perfect for adding interest and flavour to a basic dungeon.
The Sewer Set: Send your adventurers into the dark, dank depths of the sewers...
The Prison Set: This set adds plenty of extra rooms and passageways including Prison cells, a torture chamber, guard rooms and more. This set also works as a great addition to the base set allowing you to layout a huge Dungeon!
The Mansion Set: This set adds enough tiles to create the floor plans for an old mansion or town house. There is a mix of stone floors and wooden floors, allowing for these tiles to be mixed in with all our existing sets for maximum potential.
Laminated Neoprene or Cloth Topped Neoprene? 
Everyone has seen playmats that are used almost ubiquitously for wargaming now. Essentially large-scale full colour printed mouse-mats, these have enabled gamers the world over to have beautiful looking gaming tables without the mess of trying to model one themselves. 
Neoprene is a wonderfully non-slip material when placed your tabletop (or many surfaces for that matter) and for me this is incredibly important. Gone is the need to tack or tape cardboard tiles down or worry that a small breeze or errant limb will knock the tiles across the table. 
Cloth topped neoprene gaming mats are usually quite matte with only a hint of shine from the printing process. By choosing a laminated finish instead you add a very definite shine but this creates the perfect ‘dry-wipe’ surface for your dungeoneering needs.
Due to the lamination process tiles with this finish do naturally have an ever so slight curl at the very corners as you can see in the pictures. I have found that this is almost completely unnoticeable when using the tiles on your tabletop during a game, but is accentuated when viewing photos online, taken at oblique angles... 
 Hoe does Laminated Neoprene Behave?
PLAY

Individual Tiles?  
A conscious decision was made during design that we wanted each tile to be an individual room or passageway, so that the Dungeon Planner would have maximum autonomy in designing their layout. With squares tiles containing a selection of rooms you often have to lay the tiles out in a grid that makes everything feel just a bit planned and lifeless (imagine the twisting Gothic streets of Bruges, versus the gridded layout of Milton Keynes in England).
Tile Sets  
 All dungeon tile sets will be available as add-on items:

Sewer Set £30  
Expansion Set £30  
Prison Set £30
Mansion Set £30
Industrial Fantasy Set £30
Further sets will be added here as they are unlocked.  
Dice Trays
We also have a small range of Dice Trays featuring our Dungeon Tile artwork. These are printed cloth topped neoprene with poppers at each corner to assemble. The trays are 8"x7" when lying flat. 
Dice Tray: £15
 All rewards will be set as standard shipping via Royal Mail.

campaign.story:
Following on from the incredible success of our first Kickstarter (1932% funded and 100% delivered on time) we are expanding into the deep dark depths...
Welcome to the Dungeon Realms, a range of full colour, laminated, neoprene dungeon tiles.
The Dungeon Realms tiles have been designed to be thematic, colourful and interesting but at the same time simple enough to not draw focus from your miniatures or any dungeon furniture you may wish to add to your game. They have also been designed (where possible) to be as location neutral as can be, so you can mix and match sets and create dungeons for any part of your campaign world.  
We are launching with three sets of tiles but depending on funding and stretch goals there will be many more to choose from.
Depending on your pledge level your reward will be a number of Dungeon Realms sets chosen from those listed below.
1. The Core Set
This set of tiles should give you more than enough generic dungeon pieces to build hundreds of dungeons. These are our most generic tiles, designed to be the foundation that all other sets build from.
2. The Sewer Set
Everyone needs a good sewer to go adventuring in. This set was designed to let you build some dark, dank sewer encounters, maybe as part or a larger dungeon or as a dungeon in and of itself!
 3. The Encounter Set
This set is designed to add a flourish to your dungeon with unique rooms and spaces. These tiles are far more decorated and detailed adding interest to your dungeon.
£5000 - 1 x Free Spell Circle Feature Room (LOCKED)
The first stretch goal is a free 4"x4" tile that can be used as a small room by itself or layered with many other rooms to create a new or different feature.
All backers of physical tile sets will receive one of these tiles, digital backers will receive a digital copy.
£7500 - 4x Free 'Small' Feature Tiles (LOCKED)
Our second stretch goal is a set of smaller 2"x2" tiles each with a small feature that can help drive your adventurers on to new goals or simply create an interesting feature. We have a mysterious trap door, a ornate pool of holy water and two as yet mysterious tiles...
All backers of physical tile sets will receive one of these tile sets, digital backers will receive a digital copy.
Further Stretch Goals
Further stretch goals include new Add On items like a room expansion set, a passageway expansion set, a mansion tile set, a grungy sci-fi tile set, an industrial fantasy tile set, a second encounter set with new 'boss rooms' and if we get there a Japanese style tile set. There will be more news on these as the campaign progresses.
Laminated Neoprene?  
Everyone has seen playmats that are used almost ubiquitously for wargaming now. Essentially large-scale full colour printed mouse-mats, these have enabled gamers the world over to have beautiful looking gaming tables without the mess of trying to model one themselves.
Neoprene is an incredibly non-slip material when placed your tabletop (or many surfaces for that matter) and for me this is incredibly important. Gone is the need to tack or tape cardboard tiles down or worry that a small breeze or errant limb will knock the tiles across the table.
Normally neoprene gaming mats are printed onto a cloth top so despite a slight metallic sheen, are usually quite matte. We have been able to add a layer of laminate to our tiles, removing the metallic sheen, enriching the colours and most importantly creating the perfect ‘dry-wipe’ surface for your dungeoneering needs.  
Individual Tiles?  
A conscious decision was made during design that we wanted each tile to be an individual room or passageway, so that the Dungeon Planner would have maximum autonomy in designing their layout. With squares tiles containing a selection of rooms you often have to lay the tiles out in a grid that makes everything feel just a bit planned and lifeless (imagine the twisting Gothic streets of Bruges, versus the gridded layout of Milton Keynes in England).
Finally... 
Neoprene tiles are much easier to store than any 3D tiles and yet with the laminated colour print still have a visual appeal on the same level (or better) than most 3D sets.

Sewer Set £30
Expansion Set £30
Further sets will be added here as they are unlocked.

campaign.story:
Ballista is a new line of adventures and gaming material published by Arcana Creations. The books in this series are all about providing a basic, rules-light, gaming experience making it easy to get into and start playing.
With our CA $3500 reached, we are producing an additional adventure to the original 5. All backers who pledged CA $6 or more is entitled to a copy of this 6th (as yet unrevealed) Ballista release matching the formats of their pledge level.
On top of that, we have also reached our 74 backer goal unlocked access to the BETA copy of the Ballista Rules Companion to all backers once it becomes available.
Arcana Creations is a small hobby-publisher that has produced material for the Castles & Crusades role playing game from Troll Lord Games, as well as material for Swords & Wizardry from Frog God Games. We have collaborated with other publishers such as Brave Halfling Publishing in the past, but now mainly focus on growing and increasing our own product output. 2017 saw the launch of the Arcana Elements imprint to produce non-gaming related books as well as the launch of the new Ballista line in 2018.
The concept behind the Ballista line has changed a lot from inception to implementation. The purpose of this campaign is to properly launch a new gaming line which is compatible with various editions of the world's most popular RPG as well as its relatives and simulacra. With that in mind, the goal of this campaign is the publication of FIVE gaming modules which will need very little additional rule books to actually play.
It is important to stress that Ballista is not a new game system. As written, these modules are compatible with systems like Castles & Crusades, Swords & Wizardry, and many others. However, included in every book on the inside cover is a basic rule set to allow you to run the adventure WITHOUT the need of a rule book if one isn't close at hand. All you would really need beyond the book are some characters, dice, and some friends!
When Arcana Creations started out, in partnership with Brave Halfling Publishing, we released three modules for Castles & Crusades and two of those were subsequently released for Swords & Wizardry in electronic format. These were The Secret of Ronan Skerry, The Ruins of Ramat, and A Trick on the Tain. When they were first released, they were well received but the release was small and limited.
These three modules have been updated and, in some cases, overhauled for the new Ballista line. In addition to these three, we are releasing two new, never-before-published, adventures to round up our selection of five adventures. These are Mystery at Morfurt and Hide in Plain Sight.
The great news about the production of the modules is that the majority of the work is already done! The first three modules are finished and ready to go. The last two modules have already had extensive editing work done on them and are in various stages of layout. Here are print samples of the first three modules:
With your help, we can add the final two modules to the line and get all of these out into the hands of gamers and into wider distribution!
For all the modules being produced, we offer both PDF and physical printed books. The format chosen for these are 6x9 inches and the finalized page count for the first three are 20 pages each. Page count for the last two haven't been finalized yet but they will not fall below 20 pages. In fact, it is probable that Hide in Plain Sight will exceed this page count.
The 6x9 size format was chosen for a few reasons. In terms of the digital format, it is usable on 7" tablets though optimal on an 8" tablet for reasons of portability. The physical format makes it smaller than a conventional book which, along with the softcover nature of the module, makes it light and easier to ship. In fact, all five modules will be shipped in a small box (to better protect the books), and the combined size and weight of the package makes shipping to elsewhere in Canada, the United States, or abroad reasonably affordable. After the exchange rate, it will cost less than $10 USD to ship to anywhere in the continental United States as an example. Prices are similar when shipping to Europe or Australia though it will admittedly take several weeks to reach their intended destination.
Each print module comes with free PDF version of it as well and each module has a MSRP of CA $12.50 each (which works out to no more than about $10 USD). They are printed locally in Montreal, Canada in Pacesetter Silk 80 lbs paper.
THE SECRET OF RONAN SKERRY
The Secret of Ronan Skerry was written by Michael Davis and takes place on an island. It is an adventure which is largely overland and geared towards a party of lower level characters. In it, the party is called upon to investigate the disappearance of a group of monks who man the lighthouse on the other side of the island.
THE RUINS OF RAMAT
The Ruins of Ramat was written by John Adams and this version (based on the original C&C version) was expanded. It now offers additional and optional content in greater depth than the scenario's original concept of a group of adventurers out to help a little girl to rescue her pet and explore a local dungeon. While this version of the scenario can be run as originally intended, making it great to play with your kids, the added content adds more depth and throws a twist making it worthwhile to explore further. It is primarily a low-level dungeon crawl.
A TRICK ON THE TAIN
A Trick on the Tain was written by Keith Hackwood and is primarily a local-area overland scenario. The adventure takes place over a broader region and can firmly be classified as a low-level wilderness adventure taking place in a tundra environment. There are enough ideas in the pages of the module giving plenty of room for a creative GM to flesh out and expand if they wish leading to a larger campaign in the region.
MYSTERY AT MORFURT
 Mystery at Morfurt was written by Todd Pote and deals with the children of the village of Morfurt that have suddenly gone missing. Fearing a great evil is responsible, the Earl of the region dispatches a party of adventurers to investigate. It is written as a low-level scenario with a mixture of overland and cave/dungeon exploration.
HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT
Hide in Plain Sight was written by Bill DeFranza and starts with a party of adventurers hired to rescue an Earl's kidnapped daughter but they soon realize that all may not be as they appear. It is written as a low-level scenario and is primarily dungeon-based.
A NOTE ON THE SPECIAL COLLECTOR'S PLEDGE LEVEL
We recently found a limited amount of old stock that was remaining from the Castles & Crusades version of The Secret of Ronan Skerry and A Trick on the Tain. This is a limited reward option and once these are gone, they will not be reprinted. If you are a C&C collector or fan, this might be one of your last opportunities to add these to your collection.
Upon funding... all backers (CA $6 or higher) will receive an additional adventure becoming the sixth title in the Ballista Adventures line. The format of this additional adventure will match the format available in your pledge level. Title to be revealed later.
Upon reaching 74 Backers... Each backer will receive a PDF copy of the Ballista Rules Companion (BETA). This reward will be delivered regardless of the success or failure of this project.
No significant stretch goals have been announced at the start of the campaign but that doesn't mean there aren't a couple surprises in store once we surpass our funding goal! There are things we have planned however, any stretch goals that may happen will be offered as digital options only. The choice is, in part, to keep the shipping costs on any physical rewards unchanged. If a physical version of a stretch goal is possible, an option to have this as a purchased add-on will be made available in addition to the free digital version.
In addition to the Ballista modules we have here, we are offering the three current titles published through our Arcana Elements imprint. Simply add the cost of the item to the existing pledge level. For example, if you pledged at the $48 level and wanted to add a copy of Mother of Mortals to your pledge, you would add $20 to the $48 for a total of $68 plus the shipping for your region. Add-Ons will be specified to us once the campaign is over and surveys go out.
Mother of Mortals ... CA $20
Star Rover ... CA $16
Quebec's Distinct Paganism ... CA $30
Additional Print Ballista Module ... CA $10
Additional Digital Ballista Module ... CA $5
Please note that, depending on stock levels and shipping destination, any the books could be shipped separately from the Ballista modules. If they do ship separately, they are likely to ship earlier than the rest of the rewards in this campaign.
In the Fairy Forest illustration ©AtelierSommerland - Can Stock Photo Inc.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With the material written and the majority of the editing complete, we do not foresee any issues in fulfillment nor do we expect any. Electronic copies will be distributed online via Driverthru RPG (RPGNow) and the modules are produced locally at a reputable printer we've worked with before for other projects. The physical copies will be mailed out from Montreal, Canada.

We've done the necessary research regarding shipping and printing to know that there will be no cost overruns. With regards to shipping, while we managed to keep costs at reasonable levels, the time it will take to deliver packages will take longer if you are located overseas. Shipping can either be inexpensive or fast; it can't be both. For those who would like to expedite their shipping, this can be arranged at a higher cost. Please contact us through through Kickstarter to make arrangements.

The time for fulfillment, given where we are at in the production of these modules, is generous to anticipate any issues we couldn't otherwise foresee. The expectation is this will happen earlier than stated in order to complete this within the specified time frame. In the event that this campaign is more successful than anticipated, there will still be enough leeway to complete fulfillment on time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
At this point Ballista Adventures fulfillment is pretty much complete.
Save for a couple of packages, they have all been mailed out and are on your way to the backers. In some cases, they have already reached their intended destination. Digital rewards for the five adventures plus the one stretch goal adventure have also been made available by private message on this platform and now, emails have gone from DriveThruRPG providing links to the same five adventures on that platform.

As I briefly alluded to in a previous update, we are launching a new Kickstarter.  Now that fulfillment is well on its way of being completed, I feel it's safe to 'kick off' the new campaign.
The Cloud Born is a new novel by Marisol Charbonneau and follows the events of her first novel, Mother of Mortals. You can find the link to the Kickstarter HERE.

Now that all physical rewards are ready and are being shipped, I thought it would be nice to post a few pictures on what sort of package backers will be receiving. The following pictures apply to the All Print Pledge level but packages with fewer items will be very similar. It should go without saying that packages with more items will be larger as well.

The link to the adventure stretch goal have has been sent out to qualifying backers!
It was wrapped up a few nights ago and was the last stumbling block that was causing a delay on physical fulfillment. A followup post on that will come in the next few days.
Suffice to say that this is a major milestone for this Kickstarter. There is technically one stretch goal left and that is access to the BETA ruleset of the Ballista Rules Companion when it's ready. Thankfully that is relatively 'open-ended' and I'll be providing links to all backers after a bit more work is completed on it once physical fulfillment is completed.

OK.  My last post was about 5 weeks ago and the last time I updated the backers, my attention was being taken away to handle other obligations.  This was in the form of an important convention that Arcana Creations was participating in and, I'm please to report that it was a success. It was also an exhausting experience that took a far greater toll than was anticipated. After taking a bit more time than expected to get things sorted out, I can safely say that I'm 'back in the saddle' with the aims of wrapping up this KS once and for wall.

Since the last update, I have received print runs for Hide in Plain Sight and Mystery at Morfurt. These took a few extra days to get to me due to some internal issue they had at the printers but, like the proofs, they look good.  This of course means I have all printed products in hand... save one technically.
While all campaign specific rewards are done, the stretch goal adventure I mentioned in previous updates called 'The Brambury Disappearances' is still being worked on. Work is advancing very well on it but, to be honest, it isn't advancing as fast as I would like.

Second attempt at this update... let's hope this one sticks.
At this point, digital rewards have been made available to backers with links being provided via Private Message. If you haven't gotten them yet, please check your messages on Kickstarter. These links will direct you to a Google Drive share where you can access the files. Later in July, I will also send out links by email via Drivethru RPG.
Stretch goals are forthcoming with the adventure stretch goal scheduled to be released to all backers later this month.

campaign.story:
Kickstarter Update #13: With your help, we've closed out another successful Kickstarter! Thank you all for backing this collector's set and helping us create a new, contained boxed set for Castles & Crusades! Thank you all! Be sure to check out Backerkit to adjust your pledge levels and add rewards.
Classic Castles & Crusades. A Role Playing Game.
Castles & Crusades is a rules light fantasy RPG, powered by a simple mechanic called the Siege Engine. First published in 2004, the game quickly became a staple in the RPG market, leading the way and influencing a whole generation of RPGs. The Castles & Crusades Players Handbook, the cornerstone of the game, is on its 7th printing and headed toward an 8th. The line itself consists of a host of source books, monster books, setting books, and adventures. (For a brief overview of how to play, see the bottom of this page).
Today, more than ever, people are enjoying the pure joy of role-playing games. New players by the scores, and older players who are rediscovering the fun of role-playing games.
We want to introduce them, and you, to Castles & Crusades. To do that we want to make an affordable, fun to use, and fun to have entry point into the game.
If this project funds we’ll produce Classic Castles & Crusades as an affordable introduction to the genre and the game, bringing you the true spirit of Role Playing, in a simple, fast-playing and fun attribute-check-based rules system. 
 In this Kickstarter we are offering up THREE special collector's products for fans of the game. These three products are as follows: 
 C&C Classic Basic Boxed Set: This digest-sized boxed set is an "old school" presentation of the game, in a white box just like the original D&D rules, with saddle-stitched booklets containing a complete, but streamlined version of the game, with four character classes, four races, and magic to take your game all the way to level 10. Plus, a complete introductory adventure module! This box will be different than the Advanced and it will not be exclusive to the Kickstarter, it will eventually land in retail shops.
 C&C Classic Advanced Boxed Set: A True Collector's set, this limited, signed and numbered set will include everything from the Basic set, plus two additional books of character classes, equipment, monsters and gods; a full set of dice; character sheets; a pencil and more. This box will be different than the Basic box, sporting  a wood grain cover similar to the original OD&D box. It will be available in this Kickstarter and any left over from the very limited print run will be put in our store.
 C&C Complete Digest Rulebooks: These are the complete rulebooks for our seven core books: the Player's Handbook, Monsters & Treasure, Castle Keeper's Guide, Codex of Aihrde, Player's Guide to Aihrde, Adventurer's Backpack, and Monsters & Treasure of Aihrde. Each is the complete rulebook, exactly as you'd see it in full-size hardcover, but shrunk to digest size, softcover and printed in black and white. You can build your own set or buy all 7. 
Here's more information about each individual product, in detail. 
PRODUCT ONE: Classic Castles & Crusades Basic Box Set
Each book in the set is 5.5 x 8.5 saddle stitched (stapled) with b/w covers and interior. Each book below includes streamlined extracts from the full, complete version of the game. Much of the flavor text will be removed for space reasons, and options will be limited, but it will still present a complete game that you can campaign with for years. Each book will be laid out in a fashion that best fits its size. The box will be a standard white box and eventually it will be available in retail stores.
 Classes & Races: a book that teaches you how to create a character and advance that character to 10th level
 Eldritch Enchantments: a book of magic rules and spells through the 5th level
 Monsters & Treasure: a book filled with monsters and treasure
 Adventures in the Wilderness and Underworld: a book on how the game plays and the famed Siege Engine
 An Adventure: a new, if presently unnamed adventure.
The below picture is of the C&C Black Box we did a few years ago. The Basic Box will look similar to it, final cover and image to be determined. The books as well.
PRODUCT TWO: Classic Castles & Crusades Advanced Box Set
Each book in the set is 5.5 x 8.5 saddle stitched (stapled) with b/w covers and interior. Each book below includes streamlined extracts from the full, complete version of the game. Much of the flavor text will be removed for space reasons, and options will be limited, but it will still present a complete game that you can campaign with for years. Each book will be laid out in a fashion that best fits its size. The box will sport a wood-grain print cover that pays homage to the original D&D box set. It will be available in this Kickstarter only, aside from any unsold from the limited print run, which will eventually be available on our store.
 Characters & Magic: a book that teaches you how to create a character and advance that character to 10th level
 Eldritch Enchantments: a book of magic rules and spells through the 5th level
 Monsters & Treasure: a book filled with monsters and treasure
 Adventures in the Wilderness and Underworld: a book on how the game plays and the famed Siege Engine
 An Adventure: a new, if presently unnamed adventure.
 Adventurers Backpack: excerpts from the recently released ABP, some classes, backpacks and other material
 Of Gods & Monsters of Aihrde: A second look at the gods of Aihrde.*
Character Reference Sheets
Dice
Pencil
*This book will contain different material than that which appeared in the original Black Box.
The below picture is the wood grain look that we will strive to replicate.
PRODUCT THREE: Castles & Crusades Complete Digest Rulebooks
BUT that’s not all! We want to pay homage to the full and complete game. And what better way to do that than to release digest sized complete rulebooks for the game! In the pledges to the right you’ll see digest versions of each of the core C&C books as well as the Setting material and books written by Stephen Chenault (CEO and lead author at Troll Lord Games…. Jason Vey might dispute the lead author title).
Each of the digest books is a shrunk down version of the hardcover copy of the latest printing (the CKG will sport the new cover). They are printed in black and white. Each set will be cut and trimmed to match a perfect set for your book shelf.
We’d love to redo each of these books with special layouts for digest form, but that is two steps from impossible. If we took this approach, each of the books would require three times the pages, which would make the larger books like the Castle Keeper Guide unwieldy and weak in the spine. 
So do keep in mind that these highly collectable books are shrunk down versions of our wonderful game. They are the same books, same page counts, same layout, etc. They are just smaller. On the left you'll see the regular Players Handbook, on the right the digest size Players Handbook.
The titles in the set include:
Castles & Crusades Players Handbook (7th Printing)
Castles & Crusades Monsters & Treasure (5th Printing)
Castles & Crusades Castle Keepers Guide (3rd Printing Cover)
Castles & Crusades Adventures Backpack (1st Printing)
Codex of Aihrde (2nd Printing)
Castles & Crusades Players Guide to Aihrde (1st Printing)
Castles & Crusades Monsters & Treasure of Aihrde (2nd Printing)
PLEDGE LEVELS
We are offering several pledge levels. The first is a simple show your support level, the second allows you to build your own pledge and after that it's the package deals!
$5.00: Show your support. This pledge allows you to pitch in by showing your support for the game that is truly the storytellers RPG.
$20.00: With this pledge you secure 1 digest book of your choice. You can now build your pledge with add-ons! For each book you want, simply add 15 dollars to your pledge. When the campaign is over, we'll hook up with you and determine what books you want!
$50.00: This pledge lands you the Castles and Crusades Collector's Box Set Basic and includes the following books: Men & Magic, Eldritch Enchantments, Monsters & Treasure, and Adventures in the Wilderness & Underworld and an adventure!
$99.00:  This pledge lands you the collectors box set for Castles and Crusades Collector's Box Set Advanced and includes the following books: Men & Magic, Eldritch Enchantments, Monsters & Treasure, Adventures in the Wilderness & Underworld, an separate adventure, character reference sheets, a complete set of dice and a pencil! As a throw back to the original C&C White Box, these will be signed and numbered.
$100.00: This pledge lands you the entire seven books in the digest set. Any books that are added after funding through stretch rewards are likely to land in this pledge.
$200.00: You receive both the C&C Digest Collector's Set and the C&C Classic Advanced Box set, signed and numbered.
As this Kickstarter grows, so will the rewards. Follow below on the map and find out what treasures you can help us all unlock. Rewards are explained below the map.
$4,000 Collector's Set Funded: FUNDED! We will send the Players Guide to press!
$7,000 Magnifying Glass: UNLOCKED! Those digest books are pretty cool, but the text is small! Every order for the digest books will include a credit card sized magnifying lense! 
$10,000 Beneath the Canopy Green: UNLOCKED! We will add Beneath the Canopy Green adventure series to the Digest Collection! It will be added to the $100 and the $200 level and included as an add-on.
$13,000 Reference Sheets: UNLOCKED! Like the game of old, we'll include C&C Reference sheets for equipment tables, monsters, character references, etc.
$15,000 Amazing Adventures: UNLOCKED! We will add Amazing Adventures RPG Core Book to the Digest Collection! It will be included in the $100 level and the $200 level and included as an add-on.
$18,000 Towers of Adventure: UNLOCKED!What would an RPG game be like without adventure to play! We are going to release the small box booklet sized PDFS (5.5 x 8.5) of the original Towers of Adventure by James M. Ward. These three books were released in a small box form years ago and include: Vol 1: Illustrations and Maps, Vol 2: Hooks, NPCs & Monsters, Vol 3: Treasures & Traps. Each of these PDF will be made available for all backers $20.00 and above.
What is Towers of Adventure??? Its a fantastic resource that lists towers, room, NPCS, monsters, Treasures and more, that allows you to interchange them and make any number of thousands of scenarios.  Towers of Adventure is the ultimate adventure on the go resource. Designed by James M. Ward for the Castles & Crusades Role Playing Game, Tower of Adventures offers the Castle Keeper a marvelous set of interchangeable tower levels, rooms, monsters, NPCs, traps, and treasures. Originally published in small box in three booklets.
$20,000 Towers Vol. 1 Printed: Unlocked! We are going to print Vol. 1 to Towers of Adventure and include it in the $99 and $200 packages! These books will fit in the box!
$20,000 PDF Challenge!!: Unlocked! PDFs of the boxed sets and digest books will be available for the appropriate pledge level!
$22,000 Towers Vol 2. Printed: Unlocked!  We are going to print Vol. 2 to Towers of Adventure and include it in the $99 and $200 packages! These books will fit in the box!
$24,000 Towers Vol 3. Printed: Unlocked! We are going to print Vol. 3 to Towers of Adventure and include it in the $99 and $200 packages! These books will fit in the box!
$26,000 Towers Combined Digest Form: Digest version of the all three Jim Ward books. We are going to bind them into one book and release them in digest form! These will join the other digest size books!
Below is a list of items that we are offering as add-ons. These include all the books from the digest version as well as extras of the C&C Classic Set.
Castles & Crusades Players Handbook: $15.00
Castles & Crusades Monsters & Treasure: $15.00
Castles & Crusades Castle Keepers Guide; $15.00
Castles & Crusades Adventures Backpack: $15.00
Codex of Aihrde: $15.00
Castles & Crusades Players Guide to Aihrde: $15.00
Castles & Crusades Monsters & Treasure of Aihrde: $15.00
Castles & Crusades Classic Collector's Box Set Basic: $50.00
Castles & Crusades Classic Collector's Box Set Advanced: $99.00
Castles & Crusades Beneath the Canopy Green, Digest: $15.00
Amazing Adventures Digest: $15.00
How Castles & Crusades Plays
It’s simple, elegant rules system allows you to develop your own stories, to take control of the game like never before. There are six main attributes: strength, intelligence, wisdom, dexterity, charisma and constitution. There are standard classes like wizard, fighter, rogue, etc. and races like human, elf, dwarvf, gnome and halfling.
When designing your character, you roll 3d6 six times for your attributes (this is one method) and assign the totals to each of the six attributes however you desire. You then assign each attribute a primary or secondary status. Humans have three and demi-humans 2. These attributes are the cornerstone of the Seige Engine. You will use them to solve any problem or overcome any challenge except for combat. To do so the Castle Keeper will ask you to roll an attribute check. You will roll a d20, add your level and you attribute bonus to the number rolled and tell the CK the total. THAT number determines whether you succeed or fail. Primary attributes have a base chance to succeed of 12, secondary attributes a base chance to succeed of 18. The CK will adjust that with a level of difficulty, or challenge level, and you must beat that number. 
Example: You want to swim a river. The CK asks you to make dexterity check. Dexterity is a prime, you are 3rd level and have a +1 due to attribute bonus. You roll a 14+level+attribute bonus. You inform the CK that you rolled an 18 prime. Because it’s a prime, she knows the base is 12. She has assigned a challenge level of 4 to it. Meaning you need 12+4 for a total of 16. You made it. HAD dexterity been a secondary ability you would have failed, as the base chance to succeed is 18+4=22. You would have missed by several points.
That’s the Siege Engine in a nut shell. Its very versatile, easy to use and adapts to ANY style of play. The true hidden joy of the SE is the CK controls what attribute you roll. Swimming a river? That can be ANY attribute the CK desires: dexterity, intelligence, strength etc. 
The mechanic is designed to tailor to YOUR game.
Play it. You’ll love it.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
It's always difficult to create collector's material. Items meant to be displayed, not used. Determining whether enough people are interested or not is no easy matter. Kickstarter offers the perfect vehicle for that.

However, creating digest books is always a challenge. Their size alone makes managing the production process time consuming and difficult as we must balance a readable manuscript with a small one, all the time making certain it is useful to the end user, as many will want to play using these books.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
From his gleaming palace, the Sultan of Efreet turns his cruel gaze upon the Lost Lands ...
The Sultan bids you welcome...
Good folk have vanished. Those who were once disparaged and forgotten now wield power unlike anything seen before. Rulers and sages turn a blind eye to the disturbing events unfolding around them. In every corner of the Lost Lands, the Cult of the Veiled One spreads unchecked.
Prophesizing a cleansing jihad of flames and the coming of the Burning One, the cult has erected its brazen spires in every land. What follows depends on the wit and courage of mighty heroes who must rise to the occasion and take the fight to the enemy in its very stronghold. Will they succeed, or will they succumb to the temptations of the Veiled One’s court and join in the conquest of their home world? A fabled city of wishes on the edge of an eternal flame. The City of Brass is a rich combination of sand-box style role playing adventure, planar exploration, and twisted dungeons designed to test even the most seasoned adventurers. 
Beginning with low-level challenges in the familiar confines of the Lost Lands, the adventure leads characters on a thrilling journey through multiple planes of existence culminating in the exploration of the City of Brass itself. The gleaming towers and floating platforms of the city hold terrors and wonders such as the Great Repository and the Minaret of Screams. Characters may choose to take a turn in the Circus of Pain, raid the floating Pyramid of Set, or join the resistance to the Sultan’s oppressive rule and lead an assault on the palace itself! A phoenix rises fully formed from the ashes of the past. The City of Brass is re-imagined for the new renaissance of fantasy role playing games, brought to you in the epic style of old school fantasy campaigns of yesteryear.
From the design team that brought you Bard's Gate and Sword of Air, the City of Brass is an adventure unlike any other. With full color art and maps, new content and new organization, the City of Brass returns bigger and better than ever! An Adventure Sourcebook for characters level 1-20. New versions for Swords & Wizardry and the Fifth Edition of the world’s most popular role-playing game.
Example of one of the over 100 maps in the City of Brass.
City of Brass 2018 
One of the original books from the City of Brass by Necromancer Games
So what’s new in this release compared to the original Necromancer Games Boxed Set? 
This new release of The City of Brass includes all new color maps by Alyssa Faden and Robert Altbauer. Plus amazing new color art by Colin Chan, Adrian Landeros, Terry Pavlet, Michael Syrigos, C. J. Allan Marsh, and Artem Shukaev.
The original City of Brass was divided into 3 books and has been revised and reorganized throughout with 150,000 new words of adventures and material.
Section1: Cult of the Burning One - Now includes the following adventures:
Lornedain the Secret Flame: An introductory adventure for characters Levels 1-3.  
Freegate: the Brazen Spire (For Levels 4-6), giving new details to the Lost Lands city of Freegate as the characters investigate the arrival of a new cult and its magical tower.  
The Sea of Baal: (For levels 5-8). Adventures in the Titian Isles, the Elemental Plane of Air and Beyond as they travel across the Sea of Baal to the continent of Lybinos!  
Numeda a Caliphate in Flames: (For levels 6-9). Arriving in Lybinos the characters discover that the city of Cirtius in the Caliphate of Numeda is over-run by the forces of the Sultan of Efreet. Help free the survivors or join the Sultan in his conquest of the Lost Lands!  
The Path of the Prophet: (For Levels 8-10). Rewritten from the original with new content.  
Section 2: The City of Brass is now newly organized with details on factions, new locations in the Plane of Molten Skies.  
Section 3: Tales of Brass  
New Adventure Locations including:  
Ard’s Sanctuary: An adventure location for 11-14th level characters.
Freeman’s Tower: An ultra-dimensional apartment complex and home base located in the lower city. Conquer the tower and live rent free under the Sultan’s nose! For 11th-14th level characters.  
The Apartment of Ra Po Jejh!: An old enemy makes a surprise return. Find his phylactery and finish him off once and for all! For 16th-18th level characters!  
Cathedral of the Lightbringer: The cathedral of the Lord of Infurnace’s minions serving as his consulate in the City of Brass. Steal the Sword of the Lightbringer if you Dare!

Note from the CEO
All Frog God Games hardcovers are stitched into 16-page packets, the packets are sewn together, and then all the packets are sewn to a cloth backing, creating a book block that is glued to its cover. This is what we mean when we say "library binding." So, what does this mean to you? Well first, you will note that our books cost a little more than others. That being said, after a myriad of book-binding issues both recently and dating back to 2nd Edition, there is nothing we hate to see more than someone investing in an expensive game book and having it fall apart on them after only a short period of regular use. We feel strongly that book production quality is king. After all, you guys spend a lot of money on your books! Second, if a Frog God hardcover book ever falls apart (we have tested this with baseball bats and very rough use, by the way), we will replace it at no cost assuming we still have one in stock. Yes, that means if you call me in ten years, and your book binding has failed you (failed us really) through regular use (please no bulldozer roll overs), just email me and if the book is still in stock, we will mail you a new copy for free. Nothing I can do for you if they are all sold out though (but email me anyway and I'll hook you up in some way). It costs us a lot of money to do this, and our margins are somewhat lower than they could be as a result. Frog God Games stands behind our product (and sometimes on top of it when we need a ladder), and believe that the improved quality and durability of our work is well worth it.
Backerkit enables us to get you the rewards you want both faster and more reliably than we could otherwise. No reward is eligible for shipment without Backerkit checkout. You will be asked to create a Backerkit account to select your reward. This process verifies both reward selection and your correct shipping address. PLEASE complete the Backerkit process in a timely fashion so we can deliver your pledge reward!
We will email the instructions to groups of eligible backers with instructions on how to access PDF pledge rewards. This is a three-step process that is completed using our web store. You will have to create a customer account on the Frog God Games website to get your PDF; it's how we keep track of everything. The Kickstarter PDF files are 'purchased' at zero cost by backers (as they are paid for after the Kickstarter) at the Frog God Games web store using a coupon code. That code we will be sent via email to backers or will be provided through Backerkit. This process gets you your correct reward, ensures your future access to your reward files, and allows us to track project fulfillment.
When the Backerkit site for this project is ready, you will receive an email. This is a separate communication than the Kickstarter survey. In that email you will receive the link to the site where you will be asked to verify your shipping information, your pledge rewards, and checkout through their system. Your Kickstarter pledge amount does not include shipping. It is during Backerkit checkout that your shipping cost is calculated and charged.
NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Shipping international has become very expensive, expect to pay between $50-80 to ship your reward. This cost is based on the ACTUAL SHIPPING COST plus $5 and is calculated in Backerkit.
Building the City of Brass
Click the image to watch!
It has become traditional for Matt Finch to make a model of some part of our bigger adventures while the Kickstarter is live, and then make a video in which you see the model from miniature's eye level, walking through the adventure and seeing it through the eyes of the adventurers. Matt, Zach, and Jim are making one of the city's Black Magic Bazaars as the model for this Kickstarter. Keep track of their progress as the Kickstarter rolls forward. Here is a link to the first video, with special guest star Casey Christofferson, the author of the book! There will be lots of "secret" information about the city coming out in these videos, as well as tips for painting minis and terrain and how to make good scenery for city adventures! Don't forget to subscribe to Matt's channel if you want to get notifications of each video's release.

campaign.story:
Advanced Labyrinth Lord
Labyrinth Lord was first published in 2007, and for over 10 years has been one of the premier old-school "retro-clone" games. Its wildly popular supplement, the Advanced Edition Companion, adds all of the "advanced" first edition options for Labyrinth Lord, all while keeping compatibility with the B/X basic fantasy game.
For the first time, Labyrinth Lord and the Advanced Edition Companion will be seamlessly combined into one volume! Fans have been asking for this for several years, and it is my pleasure to make it happen! All of the basic and advanced options, magic items, and monsters will be brought together under one cover for easy reference.
Here are some facts about the combined book:
This is not a new game.
This is simply a combined book.
You will still be able to separate "basic" from "advanced" game options.
Much interior art will carry over from the original books, but new interior art will be featured in addition.
This combined book does not replace the current separate books. Those books will remain in print.
Cover Options and Realms of Crawling Chaos
There are 4 cover options available to backers. The first two will be available after this Kickstarter campaign is over, but the other two are limited and available in this Kickstarter only! These last two covers hearken back to earlier cover versions of Labyrinth Lord.
In addition, for the first time ever and only available now, Realms of Crawling Chaos is presented in hard cover format as a backer add-on!
COVER 1, Artist Jeff Ward
 Cover 2, Artist Joshua Stewart
Cover 3, Artist Steve Zieser, LIMITED!
Cover 4, Artist Jason Braun, LIMITED!
  Realms of Crawling Chaos Limited Hard Cover!

Important Backer Instructions
Your backer pledge is for a link to print your book(s) at RPGnow. You will use those links to order a copy (or copies) of your book. This means in addition to your pledge amount to me, you will pay for shipping and cost of printing. The printing and shipping expense comes later when you order your print products. The PDF eBook will be delivered by download link.

WHEN YOU PLEDGE
Select your reward. If you would like to add one or more copies of the limited hard cover edition of Realms of Crawling Chaos, add $25 to your pledge per copy.

If you would like to buy more than 4 copies of rule books (any combination of covers), select the Rule book x 4 option, and add $25 to your pledge per additional book.
Stretch Goals
People familiar with my crowd funding projects know that I like to keep them simple. It is easy to over commit and cause unforeseen difficulties in fulfillment. However, I have two reasonable stretch goals in mind as the project launches.
Funding Level

$8,000 - A solo adventure will be added to the rule book!
$12,000 - Three full-color landscape art panels! These can be printed and inserted into a custom GM Screen. These will be available to all backers at the Rule book x 1 level or above.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The books are already written. Although the chance is remote, delays could result due to technical problems in layout, or delays from art. I have given myself additional time to to fulfill this project to account for these unlikely events.

I have previously delivered on four Kickstarter projects and one Indiegogo project. I have a track record of delivering what I promise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Rundown #15: We are in the final stretch! Help us break that ceiling and release the Gazetteer!
What Comes with the $49 Package

A Map of the West Bank of the lake and Wheat Hollow
WHAT IS HARVESTERS?
Harvesters is a complete all-in-one table top role playing game packaged in a stout box, with rules, dice, adventures and maps!
Begin an epic journey in the rugged tracks of unlikely heroes. Enter the world of Harvesters, where badgers, rabbits, squirrels, and otters launch into adventures of epic wonder. Here, the smallest of creatures take on the roles of the greatest heroes: Knights, Druids, Clerics, Rogues, Wizards, and Fighters. Together, they tackle the greatest of exploits, from rescuing the princess to finding lost treasure. You'll find no humans here, only animals. They live their daily lives and do work just like humans do in your world. You may find a rabbit as a local constable, or a squirrel as a baker or a mouse as a black smith.
Art by Jim Holloway!
Chose from one of five animals to play: rabbits/hares, squirrels, badgers, otters, and mice. Each can be a fighter, wizard, rogue or more!
Harvesters is a game for all ages. It uses the time honored Siege Engine, an insanely easy to learn game system that focuses on story over mechanics. It generally takes only 15 minutes to pick the how's and why's of a Siege Engine RPG.  
If you are familiar with any of our other games (Castles & Crusades, Amazing Adventures, Victorious) you'll be able to pick it up and play it immediately. You can even bring your characters over from one world to the next, and play that star-finding and slightly funny and a little obnoxious racoon in your own game!
More on the Animals!
You can choose from the following classes: fighter, ranger, rogue, cleric, knight, wizard and druid. In its current edition you can play 1 of 5 animals (More have been added to the game, see stretch rewards below). They are: Badger, Rabbit, Squirrel, Mouse or Otter. Each comes with their own special abilities. VERY Briefly they are:
Badger: Along with your CLASS abilities, the badger has twilight vision, digging, enmity toward wolverines, primal fury and special languages.
Rabbit: Along with your CLASS abilities, the rabbit has twilight vision, burst of speed, unarmed combat, camouflage, and special languages.
Squirrel: Along with your CLASS abilities, the squirrel has climbing, fall, camouflage, special languages and is highly skilled with the bow and sling.
Mouse: Along with your CLASS abilities, the mouse has twilight vision, move silently, enmity toward rats and special langauges.
Otter: Along with your CLASS abilities, the otter has swimming, twilight vision, underwater weapons and special languages.
Harvesters is a role playing game specifically designed for family play. Using the wildly popular and easy to use Castles & Crusades Siege Engine, players choose any one of the listed animals to play, in any of the classes provided. Designed for children ages 6 and up, Harvesters is the perfect game to bring everyone together. Children delight in taking on the roles of their favorite animals and parents find the role of Castle Keeper easy and fun!  
WHAT YOUR PLEDGE EARNS YOU
We have only two pledges: a digital version or the full boxed set! Note: We have an early bird that expires Monday night June 11 at 10:00pm.

Harvesters provides all the rules, equipment, and spells you'll need to get started.
THE WORLD OF WHEAT HOLLOW
Wheat Hollow is a small village that lies upon the west bank of Lake Lotor. It is the heart of a country that includes The Quacking Woods, Black Midge Swamp, Linden Forest and so much more. Here you can wander the wilderness in search of adventure, glory, fame or gold! It all takes place on the western banks of the lake.
Wheat Hollow: The starter adventure begins when we learn that old Farmer Thistledown's farm has been burgled by an unknown beast that haunts the environs of Wheat Hollow. Plunge into the wilderness to face down the villains who bring terror to the good creatures of Wheat Hollow.  
Lost Fang's Gold: Over the last many seasons, the Southern Road has been plagued by the Long Fang rat gang - they have been hijacking goods and stealing every little bit of gold that has passed their way. The surrounding communities have been trying to track them down without any luck. All the clues lead to the Linden Forest, but nobody is overly eager to step foot in it – beside the Long Fang gang, there’s been tales of nasty critters and the ghost of a long lost wizard. Anyone who is stalwart enough to enter the woods will be richly rewarded - for to find the hideout and all the gold that has been taken will make that person wealthy indeed.
Black Tim's Prize: Pandin and his crew sailed north, carrying a map that charted the treasures of Tamias the mad fox squirrel of legend. But the map was not Pandin's, it belonged to a pug-nosed pirate named Black Tim. And Black Tim is none too happy. Expands Wheat Hollow in the town of Thimbleberry and beyond, includes the water shrew village and more.
STRETCH REWARDS
$1000: Harvesters Funding Goal: Funded! We hit this mark, we'll fund and the world of Wheat Hollow comes to life!
$4,000: Harvesters Expanded: Chipmunk Joins the Fray! Having more options to play makes for a much better game!. We'll add the chipmunk to the animals you can play!  
$5,000: Harvesters Expanded: Water Shrew Joins the Game! Again, more options, more fun! We'll add the water shrew to the animals you can play!
$6,000: Harvesters Expanded: Woodchuck Joins the Mayhem! Steve Chenault (CEO of Troll Lord Games) feeds a family of wood chucks that live out side his house. He's particularly fond of these guys. So it has to go into Harvesters! We'll add the woodchuck to the animals you can play!
$7,000: Harvesters Expanded: Frog Join the Party!  Unlocked! What would the wold be without a frog in the mix! Now you can swim the lake and see what lies on the East Side! We'll add the frog to the animals you can play!
Flash +400: 4 Players Guides: For every $100 we add before 10 PM CST we'll add one more Players Book, up to a maximum of five! Also, if we hit $8k before the same time we'll add a tshirt to the $49 and Early Bird pledges!
$8,000: Harvesters Expanded and T-Shrit: Unlocked! We are adding a turtle to the mix! This means you could, if you desired, play a teenage turtle...with a chosen profession as a ninja? T-Shirt for Early Bird and $49 backers only!
$10,000: Wheat Hollow Gazetteer: At last! We are expanding the world of Wheat Hollow with its own Gazetteer. This will include all manner of setting material. It will be available to the Early Bird $39.00 level as well as the $49.00 level in print form. It will be available to the $39.00 overseas level in digital form only!
ADD-ONS!
We've partnered with Dark Sword Miniatures to bring you some really cool add ons. If you have pledge $39.00 EARLY BIRD and $49.00, you are eligible to add on these fantastic miniatures for $40.00!
$15.00 T-Shirt: Pick a size (small to 3XL) with the animal class of your choice on it: Racoon, Squirrel, Rabbit, Mouse, or Otter.
$20.00 T-Shirt: Pick a size (4XL+) with the animal class of your choice on it: Racoon, Squirrel, Rabbit, Mouse, or Otter.
$40.00 MINIATURE PACK: Add FIVE Dark Sword Miniatures to my box set please! Click the picture to see more on these miniatures. REMEMBER: These are unpainted and may require some assembly!

Risks and challenges
One of the greatest challenges we face in creating a boxed game is creating a box that is stout enough to survive time and usage, but also one that has aesthetic appeal. Furthermore, making certain all the components fit and do not make the game unwieldy. 

We are confident that with a successful Kickstarter we can bring this product to the world not only as a great resource, but also as a great looking book.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Greetings from the Dens!
Shipping on Harvesters begins tomorrow, the 30th of May.
All the digital files in OBS have been updated. You should have the link to download those. If not, give us a shout! They include the core book, character sheets, character booklet, 3 adventures and world map.

Greetings from the Dens,
Okay...this KS has many moving parts. But...
Core book is complete
Lost Gold adventure complete
Black Tim adventure should be complete tomorrow
Wheathollow adventure should be complete today or tomorrow

Greetings from the Dens,
Hello from Wheat Hollow! Good news, the final MS for the critters section has returned from the editor. It is already laid out and waits only a final perusal before we send it to the printers. The box, dice and adventures are done or wrapped up. The last piece of this puzzle is the tee shirts, which are on target to arrive on the 21st of this month. With luck we'll begin shipping not long after that.

Greetings from the Dens!
Though you have not heard from us in a few weeks, work has not stopped. As noted in previous updates, the dice are in and the miniatures are as well. The order for tee shirts has been placed and we are waiting on those. The latest is as follows:
The Boxes are completed, printed and have shipped to us (as of this morning). 
The poster will go print this week.

Greetings from the Dens,
A quick update with no frills!
The box is proofed (on the printer end) and they should be able to get us a ship date in the next 2-4 work days.
The miniatures from Dark Sword Miniatures are in.

Greetings from the Dens,
A quick update!
The dice have arrived and the miniatures should ship to us this week. 
We are putting the order in for the tshirts today.

Greetings from the Dens,
Very quick update. The Harvesters Rule Book, with new edits and material, is in layout. We are waiting for the Creatures and Critters section to come back from the editor.
The box went to the box printer today. 
Dice have been ordered for the box sets.

Greetings from the Dens!
Where is the Harvesters?! I really thought it would be out by now; however, instead of a basically enhanced version of what we had  previously published, the game is getting a bit of a larger overhaul than I had planned or anticipated.
Jake Parker is hammering away on editing the MS. He's made great progress but isn't quite there yet. As mentioned in the previous update he is bringing the game more into line with the other Siege Engine games and particularly Castles & Crusades. This will allow you to use those resources in this game, which will make it all the more useful.

Greetings from the Dens!
Hello and how goes it. The first of the edited files for the main Harvesters book are landing on my desk. Jake, the editor, is unearthing a few things I hadn't even considered. For instance, redoing the armor list to make sure that the animals you are playing aren't wearing any animal-skin derived armor. Though that may sound odd, it makes perfect sense and I love the added sense of detail.
